sections.description:
Base Typography standards for Pagevamp and its Associate Projects.

Pagevamp uses a REM unit as its base typography thinking about dynamic font resizing on digital devices. Our font families should be used for all communications, ensuring a consistent look and feel in all online and print literature.
sections.markup:
Font Configuration
1rem = 16px Base font size
Helvetia Neue Primary font
'Helvetia Neue', Arial, sans-serif Fallback fonts
Font Sizes
Heading 1 3.75rem
Heading 2 3rem
Heading 3 2.25rem
Heading 4 1.875rem
Heading 5 1.5rem
Heading 6 1.125rem
Paragraph 1rem
sections.renderMarkup:
Font Configuration
1rem = 16px Base font size
Helvetia Neue Primary font
'Helvetia Neue', Arial, sans-serif Fallback fonts
Font Sizes
Heading 1 3.75rem
Heading 2 3rem
Heading 3 2.25rem
Heading 4 1.875rem
Heading 5 1.5rem
Heading 6 1.125rem
Paragraph 1rem

sections.description:
Buttons are used as triggers for actions. Depending on the use case, buttons contain a label and/or an icon. There are a variety of styles, sizes, and variations that can be used for different situations.

All button labels are sentence case. They should be as short as possible while clearly explaining what will happen when the button is clicked.
sections.markup:
The button will be used for basic button requirements.
The button signifies the disabled state where users won't have access to do anything with this button.
The button will be used for warning actions followed by confirmation dialogue.
The button will be used if there is a position action going on.
Base font size
Animated Icons can be used along with button to give better visual interaction to end users.
sections.renderMarkup:

sections.description: Dialogs provide the user with a focused way of accomplishing, confirming, or viewing something without entirely leaving a screen or page.
sections.markup:
Modal title

One fine body…

Modal dialogue box Configuration

Following classes should be added just beside the modal to show different sizes of modal box.

modal--sm This dialog box will be useful if we've limited content to show to end users
modal--lg This dialog box will be useful if we've long content to show to end users

sections.markup:
Warning! Better check yourself, you're not looking too good.
Warning! Better check yourself, you're not looking too good.
Warning! Better check yourself, you're not looking too good.
Notification Alert box Configuration

Following classes should be added just beside the alert class to show different sizes of alert box.

alert-success This dialog box will be useful if we've limited content to show to end users
alert-warning This dialog box will be useful if we've long content to show to end users
alert-info This dialog box will be useful if we've long content to show to end users
